messages.content:
"{{46.shot.script}}"

{{41.`Image Prompt Generation (User Prompt)`}}

Just for context, here's the entire scene below. Use it to help you construct the best AI image prompt so you have more context, and what comes before and after this particular shot.

Remember this is just for reference.

"{{43.scene.script}}"

Also, just for context, here's the entire story below. Remember this is just for reference.

"{{41.Story}}"
